wikipedia_page.main: Douglas George (born 21 September 1953) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Netherlands for Haarlem and Sparta Rotterdam.

response: Douglas George (born November 5, 1960) is an American professional stock car racing driver and mechanic. He currently serves as the crew chief of the No. 9 CR7 Motorsports Chevrolet Silverado driven by Blaine Perkins in the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series.
